description: Returns information about a user, given the user name.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The name of the user that you want to describe.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID for the Amazon Web Services account that the user is in. Currently, you use the ID for the Amazon Web Services account that contains your Amazon QuickSight account.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace. Currently, you should set this to default.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the user.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: The user's user name. This value is required if you are registering a user that will be managed in Amazon QuickSight. In the output, the value for UserName is N/A when the value for IdentityType is IAM and the corresponding IAM user is deleted.

nested_items.name: Email
nested_items.description: The user's email address.

nested_items.name: Role
nested_items.description: The Amazon QuickSight role for the user. The user role can be one of the following:.
READER: A user who has read-only access to dashboards.
AUTHOR: A user who can create data sources, datasets, analyses, and dashboards.
ADMIN: A user who is an author, who can also manage Amazon Amazon QuickSight settings.

READER_PRO: Reader Pro adds Generative BI capabilities to the Reader role. Reader Pros have access to Amazon Q in Amazon QuickSight, can build stories with Amazon Q, and can generate executive summaries from dashboards.

AUTHOR_PRO: Author Pro adds Generative BI capabilities to the Author role. Author Pros can author dashboards with natural language with Amazon Q, build stories with Amazon Q, create Topics for Q&A, and generate executive summaries from dashboards.
ADMIN_PRO: Admin Pros are Author Pros who can also manage Amazon QuickSight administrative settings. Admin Pro users are billed at Author Pro pricing.
RESTRICTED_READER: This role isn't currently available for use.
RESTRICTED_AUTHOR: This role isn't currently available for use.

nested_items.name: IdentityType
nested_items.description: The type of identity authentication used by the user.

nested_items.name: Active
nested_items.description: The active status of user. When you create an Amazon QuickSight user that's not an IAM user or an Active Directory user, that user is inactive until they sign in and provide a password.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The principal ID of the user.

nested_items.name: CustomPermissionsName
nested_items.description: The custom permissions profile associated with this user.

nested_items.name: ExternalLoginFederationProviderType
nested_items.description: The type of supported external login provider that provides identity to let the user federate into Amazon QuickSight with an associated IAM role. The type can be one of the following.
COGNITO: Amazon Cognito. The provider URL is cognito-identity.amazonaws.com.
CUSTOM_OIDC: Custom OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider.

nested_items.name: ExternalLoginFederationProviderUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the external login provider.

nested_items.name: ExternalLoginId
nested_items.description: The identity ID for the user in the external login provider.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
